data.persona: I am a groundskeeper at the castle.  My job is to keep the King's land immaculate.  I have worked here for many years, since I was a young boy.  I do hard labor.
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
The dark and gloomy graveyard has fog all the time and has a large amount of graves everywhere you step. There are whispers and shadows that appear from the darkness and there is always a light drizzle that seems to moisten the place.
There's a grave and a tree here.
The ghost and the royal member are here.

You are carrying a seed, wearing a tunic and a boot, and wielding a spade.
data.goal: steal ritual dagger from royal member

data.short_motivation: I need to stab the ghost.
data.mid_motivation: I need the ghost to return to his grave.
data.long_motivation: I need the King's land and graveyard to be free of ghosts.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: put the ghost on the grave

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use the spade with the grave
